lead_paragraph: WHITE--Alan. The NYU Langone Medical Center Fisher Alzheimer's Program celebrates the life of our longstanding supporter, Mr. Alan White, who helped us develop improved treatments for persons with Alzheimer's and their caregivers. He will be greatly missed. Dr. Barry Reisberg, Director Dr. Sunnie Kenowsky, Co-director 1/3
